tags.name: bulib-color
tags.description: context-sensitive search form allowing you to search across multiple 'search_options'

attributes.name: var
attributes.description: name of a known, default css variable (e.g. 'blue', 'red')

attributes.name: val
attributes.description: css variable set somewhere within the scope and visible via var() (e.g. '--color-accent-background' )

attributes.name: white
attributes.description: whether to have a white or a black background

properties.name: var
properties.description: name of a known, default css variable (e.g. 'blue', 'red')

properties.name: val
properties.description: css variable set somewhere within the scope and visible via var() (e.g. '--color-accent-background' )

properties.name: white
properties.description: whether to have a white or a black background

tags.name: bulib-card
tags.description: display a single concept (heading, description, cta, icon) in a small UI element

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: name and primary interactable link in the card

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: short bit of text describing the main action/concept

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: material icon displayed to the left of the

attributes.name: link
attributes.description: optional link for the href/window.open() action

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: custom javascript

attributes.name: small
attributes.description: add 'small' class to card

attributes.name: debug
attributes.description: enable logging (click tracking)

properties.name: title
properties.description: name and primary interactable link in the card

properties.name: description
properties.description: short bit of text describing the main action/concept

properties.name: icon
properties.description: material icon displayed to the left of the

properties.name: link
properties.description: optional link for the href/window.open() action

properties.name: action
properties.description: custom javascript

properties.name: small
properties.description: add 'small' class to card

properties.name: debug
properties.description: enable logging (click tracking)

tags.name: bulib-footer
tags.description: Reactive/responsive footer providing slotted middle section and customizable LoCoSo data

attributes.name: host_site
attributes.description: key for the subsite (used to populate the sitemap)

attributes.name: library
attributes.description: provide window into setting displayed 'locoso' contact data

properties.name: host_site
properties.description: key for the subsite (used to populate the sitemap)

properties.name: library
properties.description: provide window into setting displayed 'locoso' contact data

tags.name: bulib-hours
tags.description: display the hours of operation for a given library

tags.name: bulib-locoso
tags.description:
display the *LO*cation, *CO*ntact, and *SO*cial media information for
    a given library within the Boston Universities System.

attributes.name: link_class
attributes.description: optional additional class added to each link in the rendered HTML

attributes.name: library
attributes.description: current library code used as the key to swap between locoso data entries

properties.name: link_class
properties.description: optional additional class added to each link in the rendered HTML

properties.name: library
properties.description: current library code used as the key to swap between locoso data entries

attributes.name: sel_title
attributes.description: title displayed next to the dropdown

attributes.name: curr_sel
attributes.description: currently selected item code (referring to values in option map)

attributes.name: opt_code
attributes.description: the key for which option map to use for populating the dropdown

attributes.name: tag_name
attributes.description: the name of the tag which we desire to update (e.g. <bulib-locoso> = 'bulib-locoso')

attributes.name: attr_name
attributes.description: the attribute of that tag which needs to be changed

properties.name: sel_title
properties.description: title displayed next to the dropdown

properties.name: curr_sel
properties.description: currently selected item code (referring to values in option map)

properties.name: opt_code
properties.description: the key for which option map to use for populating the dropdown

properties.name: tag_name
properties.description: the name of the tag which we desire to update (e.g. <bulib-locoso> = 'bulib-locoso')

properties.name: attr_name
properties.description: the attribute of that tag which needs to be changed

tags.name: bulib-search
tags.description: context-sensitive search form allowing you to search across multiple 'search_options'

attributes.name: str_selected
attributes.description: selected search source (defaulted to first option)

attributes.name: str_options
attributes.description: search sources included in the dropdown (defaulted to just 'primo')

attributes.name: search_btn_classes
attributes.description: classes added to the search `<button>`

attributes.name: debug
attributes.description: [debugging] log actions to the console

attributes.name: prevent_action
attributes.description: [debugging] prevent search button from executing and updating the window location

properties.name: str_selected
properties.description: selected search source (defaulted to first option)

properties.name: str_options
properties.description: search sources included in the dropdown (defaulted to just 'primo')

properties.name: search_btn_classes
properties.description: classes added to the search `<button>`

properties.name: debug
properties.description: [debugging] log actions to the console

properties.name: prevent_action
properties.description: [debugging] prevent search button from executing and updating the window location
